title: Pixel 4 XL won't charge wirelessly
content:
Yesterday, my Pixel 4 XL stopped charging wirelessly. 

I have three wireless charging stands, including a Google Pixel Stand, but my phone won't charge in any of them. 

I've removed the case, started the phone in safe mode, and tried putting the phone in a horizontal position, but it still won't charge wirelessly. My Pixel 4 XL will (fortunately) charge using the cable.

What can I do to fix my phone's inability to charge wirelessly?

Thanks.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
